Sentencas: To provide answers to the concern as to how quickly the temperature of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) for transportation application will drop, a thermal analysis of the cool-down time of an SOFC stack during vehicle idle or stand-by has been carried out.
Titulo: Cool-down time of solid oxide fuel cells intended for transportation application

Sentencas: Because a large amount of thermal energy is stored in high-temperature SOFC stacks, it is important to select suitable thermal insulations to reduce heat loss.
Titulo: Cool-down time of solid oxide fuel cells intended for transportation application

Sentencas: Three typical kinds of thermal insulating materials have been selected in the present calculations.
Titulo: Cool-down time of solid oxide fuel cells intended for transportation application

Sentencas: The results indicate that a high-performance, vacuum-multifoil thermal insulation can be applied to significantly reduce heat loss and to maintain temperature uniformity across a cell stack.
Titulo: Cool-down time of solid oxide fuel cells intended for transportation application

Sentencas: Consequently, the cool-down time from 1000 to 800 degrees C is extended from 2 h (with a 5 cm thick conventional material) to about 31 h (with a 1 cm thick high-performance material).
Titulo: Cool-down time of solid oxide fuel cells intended for transportation application
